required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Relative Bioavailability of 2 Fixed Dose Combinations of Empagliflozin/Metformin Extended Release (XR) Compared With Single Tablets
clinical_study.official_title: Relative Bioavailability of Two Newly Developed FDC Tablet Strengths (10 mg/1000 mg and 5mg/750mg) of Empagliflozin/Metformin Extended Release Compared With the Free Combination of Empagliflozin and Metformin Extended Release in Healthy Subjects (an Open-label, Randomised, Single Dose, Two-way Crossover Study)

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this trial is to demonstrate the relative bioavailability of 2 newly developed fixed dose combinations (FDC) tablets containing empagliflozin & metformin XR and the single tablets of empagliflozin and metformin XR when administered singularly

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Pharmacokinetics Study, Intervention Model: Crossover Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment

primary_outcome.measure: AUC0-tz (area under the concentration-time curve of the analyte in plasma over the time interval from 0 to the last quantifiable data point), for empagliflozin and metformin
Cmax (maximum measured concentration of the analyte in plasma, for empagliflozin and metformin

secondary_outcome.measure: AUC0-infinity (area under the concentration-time curve of the analyte in plasma over the time interval from 0 extrapolated to infinity), for empagliflozin and metformin

arm_group.description: 1 fixed dose combination (FDC) tablet vs 3 single tablets under fasted conditions
1 fixed dose combination (FDC) tablet vs 3 single tablets under fed conditions
2 fixed dose combination (FDC) tablets vs 4 single tablets under fasted conditions

intervention.description: Active Comparator: 1 x Empagliflozin/2x Metformin XR tablets
Experimental: high dose Empagliflozin/Metformin XR, FDC tablet

intervention.intervention_name: 1 tablet 10 mg Empagliflozin/3 tablets Metformin XR
intervention.description: Active Comparator: 1 x Empagliflozin/3 x Metformin XR tablets
Experimental:2 x low dose Empagliflozin/Metformin XR FDC tablets
Active Comparator: 1 x Empagliflozin/2x Metformin XR tablets
Experimental: high dose Empagliflozin/Metformin XR, FDC tablet

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria:
1. Healthy males or females
2. Age 18-50 years (incl.)
3. Body Mass Index (BMI) 18.5 to 29.9 kg/m2 (incl.)
4. Subjects must be able to understand and comply with study requirements
Exclusion criteria:
Any deviation from healthy condition
